edu.stanford.nlp.pipeline

Class CoreDocument

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.nlp.pipeline.CoreDocument

  • public class CoreDocument
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper around an annotation representing a document. Adds some helpful methods.
